original_text: He took all the gold and silver and all the articles found in the temple of God that had been in the care of Obed-Edom, together with the palace treasures and the hostages, and returned to Samaria.
korean_text: 또 하나님의 전 안에서 오벧에돔이 지키는 모든 금은과 그릇과 왕궁의 재물을 빼앗고 또 사람들을 볼모로 잡아 가지고 사마리아로 돌아갔더라

sentences.original_text: He took all the gold and silver
and all the articles found in the temple of God
that had been in the care of Obed-Edom
together with the palace treasures and the hostages
